title: Prime Minister of Belgium - Wikipedia
snippet: Bart De Wever, the (former) leader of New-Flemish Alliance, was appointed as new prime minister on 3 February 2025. He is the first Flemish Nationalist to ever become Premier of Belgium.

title: Bart De Wever - Wikipedia
snippet: Bart Albert Liliane De Wever (Dutch: [ˈbɑrt də ˈʋeːvər]; born 21 December 1970) is a Belgian author, historian and politician who has served as the Prime Minister of Belgium since February 2025. From 2004 to 2025, De Wever had been the leader of the New Flemish Alliance (N-VA), a political ...

title: Alexander De Croo - Wikipedia
snippet: De Croo remained as caretaker prime minister until the new government was formed on 3 February 2025, being succeeded by Bart De Wever, leader of the N-VA. Alexander De Croo was born on 3 November 1975 in Vilvoorde in Flemish Brabant, Belgium, ...
